sentence.Network_cn: 他被控谋划妨碍司法公正。

sentence.Network_en: Any reform will destroy and pervert our constitution.

sentence.Network_en: Reading such silly stories will pervert your taste for good books.
sentence.Network_cn: 读这种愚昧的故事会败坏你对好书的嗜好.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 16.我有一个黑色的羊毛帽子，它的正前方写着“变态（pervert）“一词。其实那只是个服装牌子罢了。有一次我和我妻子孩子们在，因为天比较冷，我想也没想就把那顶帽子给我.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a verb): from Old French pervertir, from Latin pervertere, from per- 'thoroughly, to ill effect' + vertere 'to turn'. The current noun sense dates from the late 19th cent

entry.def: If you pervert something such as a process or society, you interfere with it so that it is not as good as it used to be or as it should be.

example.ex: Any reform will destroy and pervert our constitution...
example.tran: 任何改革都会破坏并歪曲我们的宪法。

entry.def: If someone perverts the course of  justice, they deliberately do something that will make it difficult to discover who really committed a particular crime, for example, destroying evidence or lying to the police.

example.ex: He was charged with conspiring to pervert the course of justice.
example.tran: 他被控谋划妨碍司法公正。

entry.def: If you say that someone is a pervert, you mean that you consider their behaviour, especially their sexual behaviour, to be immoral or unacceptable.

means.word_mean: 1. a person whose behavior deviates from what is acceptable especially in sexual behavior
1. corrupt morally or by intemperance or sensuality;

sentences.sentence: "debauch the young people with wine and women"
"Socrates was accused of corrupting young men"

means.word_mean: 2. practice sophistry; change the meaning of or be vague about in order to mislead or deceive
3. change the inherent purpose or function of something;

sentences.sentence: "The director of the factory misused the funds intended for the health care of his workers"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"贯穿,自始至终;全部"; 2. 表示"假,坏"

per贯穿,自始至终;全部+man拿住+ent……的→永久拿住→永恒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+nic毒+ious……的→有毒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+plex重叠+ed……的→重叠在一起→困惑的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了→透视的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spic看+acious多……的→全部看到→独具慧眼

per贯穿,自始至终;全部+turb搅→直搅乱→扰乱
per假,坏+fid相信+y状态→假相信→不忠诚
per假,坏+jur发誓+y状态→假发誓;参考:jury陪审团
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+forate打孔→打孔穿过→打洞
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+fuse流→流遍

per贯穿,自始至终;全部+sist站→站到最后→坚持
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+suade劝→一直劝→劝说

per假,坏+vert转→转向坏→堕落
un不+converted[adj.更换信仰的, 修改的]→adj.不改的, 不变化的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不能兑换的,不能变换的

vert转+ical……的→转直→垂直得
advertise[v.公告,公布;为……做广告 v.登广告]+ment表名词→n.广告;公告;登广告
controvert[v.反驳,驳斥]+sy→controversy争论,辩论
revers=revert[v.回复到,重议]+ion表名词→n.返回[原状,旧习惯],逆转
vert转+ical……的→转直→垂直得
vert转+igo→转着走[go around]→眩晕
ad加强[有"向"之意]+vert转+ise表动词→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……

stems_affixes.value_cn: 防止,避免 ;转移[目光,注意力等]

contro=contra相反+vert转→相反转→反驳

in进+vert转→转进去→倒置,倒转
per假,坏+vert转→转向坏→堕落
re回+vert转→转回来→恢复

means.word_mean: 使堕落, 把…引入邪路, 使变坏

sentences.en: He was perverted by his evil companions.
sentences.cn: 他被他的坏伙伴引入邪路。

sentences.en: He was arrested and charged with attempting to pervert the course of justice.
sentences.cn: 他被逮捕并被指控企图妨碍司法公正。
